body: For English readers, Chapters 1-9: https://nhentai.net/g/292905/ #### Chapters 10-12: https://nhentai.net/g/330294/ **** Short summary (WARNING SOME SPOILERS AHEAD BACKSTORY INFO): Basically, Tomoya (BAG) is a cuck and wants Yuka (GF) to have sex with Masateru (MC). Thru the story's tribulation, they end up liking each other. MC finds out BAG enjoys letting GF be fucked by other men but saves GF in the onsen. MC wants to believe in GF and gives her one last chance: stay away from BAG. GF chose otherwise. MC reveals that GF's dad was a motherfucker who forced sex with MC's mom, then his parents divorced and MC's father left, MC's mom worked to death to repay GF's dad cuz scum wanted $ back. MC is back for revenge. GF gets the sad end.
Guys there was a translated ending a while ago https://nhentai.net/g/330294/
Well, cheating bastard like her deserved it.

Boyfriend has gf cheat on him with his friend. The friend that was fucking the gf is actually the son of the woman whom the FL’s father had an affair with so his family was ruined and now he wants to ruin the FL and make her father pay for what he has done.

For anyone interested the original boyfriend was cuck or rather wanted other people to sleep with his girlfriend .  The other guy was trying to get Ray back on the girls father for what was done to her family.

I can't read japanese, but I sure wish I could. This is definitely a story I wish I understood. BF has...gf cheat on him? at least he seems to know about it, seems fine with it, seems to send her to the other guy and then...the other guy turns 100% douche and has the BF beaten/killed and leaves her to be raped? what?

Is that the ending? What the actual fuck?!? I thought the boyfriend was gonna pull a reverse card while the friend become the actual BF, instead this crap doesn't make sense at all and It makes the story pointlessly dark just because
Wtf was that ending it's like sudden death
Lol that bitch got her comeuppance
